script.name: !trade.getwarebest
script.description: Autom. trade for a station. Once: Search and buy a ware and bring it back.
script.sourceplaintext:
* written by SymTec for X3TC based on existing trade scripts.
* script structure: * variable checks * loop: fly to station - keep an eye on price changes * buy ware * if returnstation: go home * note: ship does not unload cargo after return.
* variable checks $price.station = get min price of ware $ware if not $price.station return null else if not $price $price = get average price of ware $ware else if $price < $price.station $price = $price.station end
$free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if not $free return null else if not $amount > 0 AND $amount <= $free $amount = $free end
do if ! $sector AND $homebase $sector = $homebase -> get sector skip if $sector $sector = [SECTOR]
skip if is datatype[ $homebase ] == DATATYPE_STATION $homebase = null
$ware.old = [THIS] -> get wanted ware $ware.old.count = [THIS] -> get wanted ware count [THIS] ->set wanted ware count to $amount [THIS] ->set wanted ware to $ware
$status.text = read text: page=6020 id=2092
* loop: fly to station - keep an eye on price changes $station = null while 1 do if [OWNER] == Player [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$status.text @ = wait randomly from 100 to 150 ms $status.text = read text: page=6020 id=2092 do if $station $price.station = $station -> get price of ware $ware
* look for better station if old station offers bad deal if $price.station > $price OR ( ! $station ) $jumps.new = get jumps from sector $sector to sector [SECTOR] $jumps.new = $jumps - $jumps.new skip if $jumps.new > 0 $jumps.new = 0
* find better station @ $station.new = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.bestbuy : Ware=$ware Max Price=$price Max Jumps=$jumps.new Check for Property=[FALSE] Find around sector=[SECTOR]
skip if $station OR $station.new @ $station.new = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.bestbuy : Ware=$ware Max Price=$price Max Jumps=$jumps Check for Property=[FALSE] Find around sector=$sector
if not $station OR $station.new skip if $retnobuy return null if not [THIS] -> is docked $status.text = read text: page=6020 id=2116 do if [OWNER] == Player [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$status.text @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosafestation : end $status.text = read text: page=6020 id=2092 do if [OWNER] == Player [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$status.text @ = wait randomly from 30000 to 60000 ms continue end
if $station.new -> exists if [OWNER] == Player do if $station -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$station Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE] $station = $station.new end end end
* move to station - jump if possible; otherwise fly. if [OWNER] == Player $free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $status.text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=2082, $ware, $free, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$status.text end [THIS] ->set destination to $station $sector.destination = $station -> get sector
do if [OWNER] == Player @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$station Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[FALSE]
if not [THIS] -> is in same sector as $station if [HOMEBASE] == [DOCKEDAT] if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Navigation Command Software MK1 in cargo bay if [THIS] -> is autojump activated if [HOMEBASE] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay $extra.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=5 $energy.needed = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $sector.destination $energy.needed = ( $energy.needed * 2 ) + $extra.energy $got.energy = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $energy.needed > $got.energy $energy.needed = $energy.needed - $got.energy = [THIS] ->load $energy.needed units of Energy Cells, ignore minimum=[TRUE] end end end end end end
* jump if possible - fly otherwise @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$station
else if not [ENVIRONMENT] == $station @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$station
skip if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $station $station = null else $price.station = $station -> get price of ware $ware if $price.station <= $price break else do if $retnobuy @ = wait randomly from 30000 to 60000 ms $station = null end end end
[THIS] ->set destination to null $gotamount = null
* buy ware while [DOCKEDAT] == $station
* no cmplx-buyout by player ships at player stations $free = $station -> get true amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $station -> uses ware $ware as primary resource $owner = $station -> get owner race $max = $station -> get ware storage percentage: ware=$ware if [OWNER] == Player AND $owner == Player AND $max < 20 $max = $station -> get max amount of ware $ware that can be stored in cargo bay $free = $free - $max / 5 end end do if $free < $amount $amount = $free
* do not buy more than you can carry $free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay do if $free < $amount $amount = $free
$gotamount = [THIS] -> buy $amount units of $ware to a max. price of $price Cr @ = wait randomly from 2000 to 5000 ms do if $gotamount OR ( ! $retnobuy ) break
@ = wait randomly from 30000 to 60000 ms
end
do if [OWNER] == Player @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.lockstation : Station=$station Ware=$ware Check Only?=[FALSE] Remove?=[TRUE]
* if returnstation: go home if $homebase AND ( $gotamount OR ! $retnobuy ) $status.text = read text: page=6020 id=2043 do if [OWNER] == Player [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$status.text
while [DOCKEDAT] != $homebase AND $homebase @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $homebase [THIS] ->set destination to $homebase @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$homebase [THIS] ->set destination to null else break end end end
[THIS] ->set wanted ware count to $ware.old.count [THIS] ->set wanted ware to $ware.old
return null * v2: no cmplx-buyout by player ships at player stations * v4: improved algorithm
